TopicTitle: [Bug] Fem Kerbal hand on controls in IVA

Articles.Content:
So, I cant be the first one to notice this...

![GnVPwBT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GnVPwBT.jpg)

Lots of mods so moving to modded.

Not seeing the issue here....

> 
> Lots of mods so moving to modded.
> Not seeing the issue here....

Me neither.....

The glove does look a bit odd, but then again, I hardly do IVA.

Edit: Took a look and I see what the OP is talking about, it's hard to see in the dark screenshot and it helps to look at it ingame. The female kerbals hand clips through the joystick somewhat.

[![screenshot80_zpszipmhtkp.png](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot80_zpszipmhtkp.png)](http://smg.photobucket.com/user/smjjames/media/screenshot80_zpszipmhtkp.png.html)

Male kerbals hands are set a bit forward from the joystick and clip a little, so neither one is perfect either.

[![screenshot81_zpsmbtwtfo8.png](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot81_zpsmbtwtfo8.png)](http://smg.photobucket.com/user/smjjames/media/screenshot81_zpsmbtwtfo8.png.html)
